titles: Epistolæ Ho-elianæ familiar letters domestic and forren divided into sundry sections, partly historicall, politicall, philosophicall, vpon emergent occasions / by James Howell.
author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.
publisher: Printed by W.H. for Humphrey Mosely ...,
notes: Added t.p. on p. [257]: A new volume of familiar letters, partly philosophicall, politicall, historicall. The second edition, with additions.
Added t.p. on p. [9] in third grouping: Additionall letters of a fresher date, never publish'd before.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  Social life and customs.
